document.full_text: to drive home the point that research was taken seriously at the galleon group, the defense inundated the jurors with articles, analyst reports and other publicly available research items.
document.title: defense in insider trial seeks to present galleon as disciplined
lines_and_colors: to drive home the point that research was taken seriously at the galleon group, the defense inundated the jurors with articles, analyst reports and other publicly available research items.
